roadmaps.tagline: Step by step guides and paths to learn different tools or technologies.
roadmaps.tip.default: Track your progress and learn by clicking roadmap items.
roadmaps.tip.mob: Track your progress and learn about the topics by clicking the roadmap items.
youtubeAlert: Roadmap topics to be covered on YouTube
bestPractices.tagline: Best practices on different topics with detailed implementation guidelines.
guides.tagline: Succinct graphical explanations to engineering topics.
videos.tagline: Graphical video demonstrations on software engineering topics.
name: Name
noProgress.description: Progress will appear here as you start tracking your Roadmaps or Best Practices progress.
hero.title: Developer Roadmaps
hero.tagline: roadmap.sh is a community effort to create roadmaps, guides and other educational content to help guide developers in picking up the path and guide their learnings.
hero.tagline.mob: Community created roadmaps, guides and articles to help developers grow in their career.
footer.opensourceRank: roadmap.sh is the 6th most starred project on GitHub and is visited by hundreds of thousands of developers every month.
footer.siteDescription: Community created roadmaps, articles, resources and journeys to help you choose your path and grow in your career.
footer.tnsDescription: The leading DevOps resource for Kubernetes, cloud-native computing, and the latest in at-scale development, deployment, and management.
login.tagline: Welcome back! Let's take you to your account.
signup.tagline: Create an account to track your progress, showcase your skill-set and be a part of the community.
password.tagline: Use the form below to update your password.
forgotPassword.tagline: Enter your email address below and we will send you a link to reset your password.
resetPassword.tagline: Enter and confirm your new password below.
verifyingAccount.loading: Please wait while we verify your account..
verifyEmailMessage.description: We have sent you an email at [-]. Please click the link to verify your account. This link will expire shortly, so please verify soon!
verifyEmailMessage.spam: Please make sure to check your spam folder. If you still don't have the email click to resend verification email.
submitLink.description: Help others learn by submitting links to learn more about this topic
Content should only be in English.
Do not add things you have not evaluated: Do not add things you have not evaluated personally.
It should strictly be relevant to the to: It should strictly be relevant to the topic.
It should not be paid or behind a signup: It should not be paid or behind a signup.
Quality over quantity. Smaller set of qu: Quality over quantity. Smaller set of quality links is preferred.
